product_name: FuelBelt Elastic Reflective Race Laces - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Replace your traditional laces with these stretchy, reflective laces for quick transitions. They supply a snug, secure fit and the reflective finish enhances your visibility in low light.
short_description: Replace your traditional laces with these stretchy, reflective laces for quick transitions. They supply a snug, secure fit and the reflective finish enhances your visibility in low light.
